skill.name: First charlottes skill need a name again
skill.description: Inflicts **280% earth attribute damage** to all enemies and inflicts **15% earth defense decrease** to the targets for **120 seconds**, grants herself **40% enhanced attack probability** increase for **3 turns** and a **50% chase damage** increase for **3 turns**

skill.name: Charlottes skill numer 2 english name please
skill.description: Deals **400% earth attribute damage** to a single enemy and grants herself **No Remorse** for **1 turn.**

effect.name: No Remorse
effect.description: Damage dealt +30%, taunt all enemies, all damage received -50%. When attacked, counter-attack, counterattack can trigger enhanced attack.

resonance.name: Charlottes OP burst I need an english name
resonance.description: Inflicts **420%** earth attribute damage to all enemies and grants herself **50% earth attribute attack increase** for **3 turns**, **30% counterattack damage increase** for **3 turns** and **50% chance to reset the cooldown of skill 2**

Every 3 rounds receive a counterattack for 1 turn

When her HP is below 50% increase hatred value
